API

PDAL is a C++ library, and its primary API is in that language. There is also a Python API that allows reading of data and interaction with Numpy.

Note

Users looking for documentation on how to use PDAL’s command line applications should look here and users looking for documentation on how to contribute to PDAL should look here.

  • C++ API
  • libLAS C API to PDAL transition guide
